p: Laravel Panel is a package for Laravel, which provides a simple and easy way to create a admin panel for your application.
Maybe it has some bugs. Please report if you find any bug.
Technical support questions are best asked in the Discussions. The discussions are monitored 24 hours a day and we will do our best to assist.
If you find a defect or would like to submit a feature request, please create an Issue and we will investigate right away.
Do you have a general inquiry? Please feel free to contact us at amirhoseinrahimi.work@gmail.com.
We ❤️ feedback.
You can install the package via composer:
You must publish the assets of the package using the following command:
See also Configuration guide for more information.
You must publish the configuration of the package using the following command:
You can change the configuration of the package in the file config/panel.php.
See Also Start Using for more information.
before you start using the package, you must install and configure it.
For each page in panel you must create a route. For example, we want to create a page for index users. So we must create a route for it.
Now we must use Panel facade in controller to create a page.
See also Panel Facade for more information.
in this section, we explain how to use Panel facade to create a page in panel.

l: You Can Use Panel Facade To:
p: make a view (see Make View)
make a table (see Make Table)
make a form (see Make Form)
You can set title for page by title method.
You can add button to header of page by button method:
See Button guide to know how to use Button class.
You can set custom user info by changeUserInfo method:
You can render page by render method:
For show a view in panel, You must:
You can add data to view by with method:
You can render view by render method:
Also you can use all methods of Panel Facade in this section.
For make a table in panel, You must:
You can add header to table by header& headers methods:
These Items are added to the end of the previous items
You can add rows to table by row& rows methods:
You can use with paginate by paginate method:
This method is remove all rows and add new rows with paginate
You can add action button to each row by action method:
See Button guide to know how to use Button class.
You can render table by render method:
Also you can use all methods of Panel Facade in this section.
For make a form in panel, You must:
First you must add a form group to form by group method, Then you can add inputs to group by input method:
See Group and Input guide to know how to use Group and Input class.
You can customize submit button by submit method:
You can set reset button by reset method:
Also you can use all methods of Panel Facade in this section.
in this section, we explain how to use Button class to create a button in panel.
If you don't use any button action, button will not work. (see Button Actions)
Icon name is from Font Awesome icons.
You must use Color enum to set button color.
You must use Size enum to set button size.
See Modal guide to know how to use Modal class.
in this section, we explain how to use Group class to create a group in panel.
See Input guide to know how to use Input class.
You can set col up to 12.
You can set mobile col up to 12.
You can set tablet col up to 12.
You can set laptop col up to 12.
You can set desktop col up to 12.
in this section, we explain how to use Input class to create a input in panel.
